price: 101. Ya sólo, baye bakozala mosika na lifelo, ezali ba oyo tosilaki kolaka bango bolamu.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ سَبَقَتۡ لَهُم مِّنَّا ٱلۡحُسۡنَىٰٓ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ عَنۡهَا مُبۡعَدُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna sabaqat lahum minnā al-ḥus'nā ulāika ʿanhā mub'ʿadūna
